title: Checking for Certificate??
body:
Every time I open the launcher it just spams me with infinite boxes of a Yes, No, and View Certificate question...

Security Alert
Revocation information for the security certificate for this site is not available. Do you want to proceed?

I get these as I said spammed at me ever 5 seconds. Please Riot help me!! D:

replies.body: I've seen fleeting reports on this, and we've been trying out some troubleshooting steps which seems to have worked for a few players.  As a first step, I recommend[ resetting your IE settings ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq5)to default, which is what the client uses and picking up the cert notice from.  In the same menu, there should be a security section that you can try decreasing to see if that will fix the issue.  Make sure to relog afterwards!
